vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.9;
father of: Eleazar (H0499I); also called Dodai at 1Ch.27.4;
Another name of do.do (דּוֹדוֹ "Dodo" H1734H)
§ Dodai = "loving" or "amorous"
an Ahohite who commanded the course of the second month; probably the same as 'Dodo'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Eleazar, guerrero; en tiempos de David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
朵代 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "情愛的" 或 "戀慕的"
負責第二個月的王室服事的亞哈希人; 可能同於 朵多[1734] (代上 27:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
朵代 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "情爱的" 或 "恋慕的"
负责第二个月的王室服事的亚哈希人; 可能同于 朵多[1734] (代上 27:4)
